If you are a fan of Zorro, Indiana Jones, or action in general this is a must-see. Directed by Republic's ace team of William Witney and John English and starring John Carroll as the title character. Some minor nitpicks: Why would anyone build houses along the rapids of the Amazon and not dish out enough for concrete? A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat hatin’ sheriff (and his k-9). Fun sequel that I thought was actually better than the first film.
